body.name: Touch in Sol Hydrating Face Moisturizer Gel Cream 1.76 oz. – Plumped Up Lightweight Day and Night Cream with Hyaluronic Acid and Collagen - Pretty Filter Waterful Glow Cream

byLineInfo.name: Visit the Touch in Sol Store

deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 19 hrs 41 mins
features: SOOTHING AND REFRESHING: Touch In Sol moisturizing face cream mitigates skin troubles to soothe your skin. The face cream is instantly absorbed into your skin and calms stressed skin to make it healthier. The blend of essential nutrients in our hydrating face cream helps reverse signs of aging to give supple skin.

IMPROVES SKIN TEXTURE AND MOISTURE BARRIER: The presence of moisturizing ingredients in our anti-aging face moisturizer creates a moisture barrier to prevent water loss. The alcohol-free hydrating face moisturizer maintains texture, tightens pores, and calms sensitive skin.

FACE CREAM WITH REJUVENATING INGREDIENTS: Touch In Sol Pretty Filter Waterful Glow Cream is an ultra-hydrating cream that contains Triple hyaluronic acid, silica, marine collagen extract, and cordyceps militaris extract for intense moisturization of dry skin.

FOR ALL SKIN TYPES: This hydrating anti-aging face moisturizer for women is formulated without artificial colors, parabens, or essential oils, making it perfect for use for any skin type. The lightweight formula makes it ideal for sensitive and irritated skin.

EASY TO USE FACIAL LOTION: Cleanse your skin using a mild cleanser and tone the skin using a hydrating toner. Take an ample amount of ouch In Sol Pretty Filter Waterful Glow Cream in your palm and gently massage on the face and softly tap the skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 25, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent cream under make-up: Best Protecting!
reviews.reviewText: It’s an excellent cream to use under make-up! Wow for this price. I have a dry sensitive skin and I have tried so many famous brands, expensive renowned creams. I received a sample of this through purchase of other Korean beauty product in amazon and I loved it so much when I tried the sample! I didn’t notice a difference right after I put it on my face, so I thought it was okay. It didn’t seem super moisturizing like other cream as I felt very light and absorbed quickly. BUT I noticed this was different when I removed all the make up with my regular routine on the same day evening and on the next day morning! My skin was very soft and no dry feeling at all! I felt like my skin has been protected by this cream throughout the day. On the next day, I felt the same and my skin got even more soft and moisturized feeling. Finally I found something that protects my skin’s moisture! And it is so cheap!!! I’m not sure if this can help the extremely dry skin (as skin’s nature moisture level would be already low) but I can recommend this to any other skin types!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My favorite im obsessed!
reviews.reviewText: The first time I used this product it was because I received on a Epsy bag subscription and I loved it because it is a gel and it does not feel greasy. I have never used a moisturizer so far that I liked so much, it smells super light and my face looks and felt like glass so radiant, my makeup looks fabulous like a porcelane doll, I am obsessed I subscribed to receive the product periodically.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Holy Grail for excessive sebum & clog-prone skin!
reviews.reviewText: I have skin that’s not exactly oily but definitely not dry. My skin tends to produce excess sebum (think thick & waxy, rather than oily) & my pores are extremely clog-prone. That being said I can’t do very rich moisturizers, but do need a very hydrating one that easily absorbs into my skin, rather than sit on the surface of my skin to suffocate my pores & thus clog them. This is the best moisturizer I’ve ever found. I’m on my 4th repurchase of it & use it daily alongside the Laniage water sleeping mask at night. This is wonderful under make up, it smells amazing- like fruity pebbles or something, & one pot lasts me quite a long time. This is intended to hydrate & plump your skin with anti-aging benefits.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love How It Makes My Skin Look
reviews.reviewText: Love how this makes me skin look under makeup. It provides the perfect amount of moisture and makes my makeup look flawless. It does smell perfumy which I am not a fan of.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 17, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Daily Moisturizer for oily skin-Impressed
reviews.reviewText: I normally use Tidal by Sunday Riley and was looking for a more cost effective alternative , at first I wasn't really impressed but as I started to use this daily, I noticed my pores closing. I have pretty oily skin and this is comparable to the water based formula of what I'm used to using. I think I actually like it better. I really love the way it feels on my skin. The scent is ok, pretty mild. It's great under make up, others would not blend well with foundation and start balling up, but this one just melts in. I feel like it leaves a natural dewey finish as well. I love the natural ingredients too! Im really impressed for the price too you just cant beat it! I'll be buying more;) BTW, I'm not getting paid for this, just an honest review!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very cool, smooth and love this!!Smells good

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars In LOVE - well worth the price.
reviews.reviewText: I got this in a makeup subscription box and my daughter promptly stole it from me. She has acne issues and this is, according to her, "the only moisturizer that feels good and doesn't cause break outs". I had only used it twice, but wanted one for myself too so I bought another one. And - man - it's as fabulous as I wanted it to be. It smells beautiful (not too fragrant, just a nice clean smell), feels light and not oily and makes my skin glow in a beautiful, healthy way. I use it morning and night.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My go to moisturizer!!!
reviews.reviewText: I received this moisturizer in ONE of my many monthly subscriptions for makeup and skincare, when it was empty I could NOT find it on ANY of the sites. BUT I did find it HERE on my AMAZON, my most reliable place for EVERYTHING. I was ecstatic. It is the BEST moisturizer for fine lines and wrinkles and I use it morning and night, I recommend it to everyone.
